articles.title: Koledžica
articles.content:
Gle, koledžica
Razgažena i sama
Jesen đonova
articles.author: john

articles.title: Sjetna
articles.content:
Na brdu podla 
panda jodla, a medo
peče rakiju
articles.author: john

articles.title: Sjećanje na Toskanu
articles.content:
Na moru mornar
vesla prema kraju
jer nema motor
articles.author: john

articles.title: Summer
articles.content:
I really like toast. 
It is yummy when it's hot. 
I like it best cold.
articles.author: steve

articles.title: Meaning of life
articles.content:
Autumn moonlight-
a worm digs silently
into the chestnut.
articles.author: steve

articles.title: Storm
articles.content:
Lightning flash—
what I thought were faces
are plumes of pampas grass.
articles.author: steve

comments.content: sjećanja na ljetne noći pod zvjezdanim nebom
comments.author: maria

articles.title: Nedjelja
articles.content:
Kruh na stolu.
Okupljeni pred objed,
mirišemo mir...
articles.author: steve

articles.title: Duboka
articles.content:
Čak ni pred carem
strašilo neće skinuti
pleteni šešir.
articles.author: steve

articles.title: Jesnje lišće
articles.content:
Za me koji odlazim,
za tebe koja ostaješ
– dvije jeseni.
articles.author: steve

articles.title: Galeb
articles.content:
Gledaj galeba
gdje gnijezdo morske pjene
krilima skriva.
articles.author: steve

articles.title: Mjesto pod suncem
articles.content:
Crveno sunce
u plavo more tone
gdje mu gasne sjaj.
articles.author: steve

articles.title: Pokisli
articles.content:
More se ljulja,
plavi valovi šume -
eno, ide brod!
articles.author: steve

articles.title: Proljeće
articles.content:
Orhideja nas
kao žena osvaja
svojom ljepotom.
articles.author: peter

articles.title: Jesen u mom zavičaju
articles.content:
Galeb visoko,
riba negdje duboko,
mirno plovi brod.
articles.author: peter

articles.title: Plaža zimi
articles.content:
Zrnca bi pijeska
iz pustinje sad pošla
na plažu mora.
articles.author: peter

articles.title: Ljeto
articles.content:
Zrnca bi pijeska
iz pustinje sad pošla
na plažu mora.
articles.author: Mark

articles.title: Pučina
articles.content:
Stablo cvjeta
cvijećem crvenim
plava izmaglica
articles.author: john

articles.title: Jesen
articles.content:
Dok lišće šušti,
iza brijega već čuči
u oblaku grom.
articles.author: Mark

articles.title: Haiku
articles.content:
Rijeka snova
vrelo nade
vrtlog želja
articles.author: john

articles.title: Deblo
articles.content:
Onkraj puta,
kraj stabla starog
stoji maslačak
articles.author: maria
